overview: When an ancient evil grows in the heart of China, it's up to the chosen twelve to stop it. As the team, led by Master Tiger trains their star pupil Polaris, they know it's only a matter of time before the biggest fight of their lives is upon them. As Polari's powers grow, he will need all of his strength to stop the evil powers mounting against him. Welcome to the world of Kung Fu Masters!
title: Kung Fu Bunny
